Title: Softix.Orchestration
Description: A simple workflow engine written in .NET that will allow non-coders to create and run workflows (like automatic parsing of emails, call center scripts etc)
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A simple workflow engine written in .NET that will allow non-coders to create and run workflows (like automatic parsing of emails, call center scripts etc).

System Requirements

  • .NET Framework 2.0
  • .NET Framework 3.0 RTM
  • For compiling the source code:
    • Visual Studio 2005
    • or you could try to compile it directly with msbuild.
